Articles.Content:
This is what I used to land on the Min. I added a decoupler because... well... I messed up and had to land on the surface using my transfer/deburn stage.

Can make it there and back with fuel spare.
What\'s the point of the landing legs if you land on the engine?

What\'s the point of the landing legs if you land on the engine?

The gravity is so weak you actually can without any trouble.

Although... avoid the mountain ranges!

The gravity is so weak you actually can without any trouble.

Although... avoid the mountain ranges!

This, and as previously stated, I forgot to add a decoupler initially.
